sentences.en: A crystal chandelier lit the room.
sentences.cn: 一盏水晶吊灯照亮了房间。

sentences.en: A crystal chandelier would look great in the living room.
sentences.cn: 在这间卧室里放一盏水晶吊灯会很漂亮的.

sentences.en: A cut - glass object, such as a pendant of a chandelier.
sentences.cn: 刻花玻璃物体如枝形吊灯的玻璃吊灯架.

sentences.en: A glass pendant, especially on a chandelier.
sentences.cn: 玻璃吊灯架玻璃垂饰, 尤指枝形吊灯上的.

sentences.en: A large chandelier glorifies the whole room.
sentences.cn: 枝形大吊灯使整个房间光亮夺目.

sentences.en: An original crystal chandelier with a gilt bronze mount.
sentences.cn: 原始水晶吊灯有镀金青铜贴装.

sentences.en: An ornate and truly magnificent example of a large Venetian glass chandelier.
sentences.cn: 华丽的真正宏伟的大型威尼斯玻璃吊灯的例子.

sentences.en: I don't want to dangle from a chandelier.
sentences.cn: 我不想吊在一棵枝形吊灯上.

sentences.en: Inside a house or cottage a wagon wheel is often used as a chandelier.
sentences.cn: 在住宅或农舍里,马车的轮子还经常被改造成枝形吊灯.

sentences.en: The beautiful chandelier depends from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 那盏漂亮的技形吊灯悬吊在天花板上.

sentences.en: The chandelier - decked foyer of the venue itself was freezing.
sentences.cn: 有着大吊灯的门厅室内温度都很低.

sentences.en: The chandelier depends from the ceiling of the ballroom.
sentences.cn: 枝形吊灯悬挂在舞厅天花板上.

sentences.en: The Chandelier Exit may act a backup exIt'strategy for experienced traders.
sentences.cn: 对于有经验的交易者,吊灯止损可以作为备用出场策略.

sentences.en: The Chandelier Exit takes a different approach.
sentences.cn: 吊灯止损采用不同的方法.

sentences.en: The chandelier hit the floor with a crack.
sentences.cn: 枝形吊灯啪的一声掉在了地板上.

sentences.en: This gorgeous piece is our first attempt at building a very cool old style chandelier complete with crystals, but giving it quite a cutting edge look.
sentences.cn: 这款华丽的枝形吊灯让我们首次尝试采用非常沉稳的冷色系水晶，但我们赋予其相当时尚的外表。

trans.tran_en: a large round frame for holding  candle s  or lights that hangs from the ceiling and is decorated with small pieces of glass
